SELECT EMAIL, PW FROM MEMBER WHERE EMAIL = #{email}

SELECT
TO_CHAR(O.ORDER_TIME, 'yyyy-MM-dd') "ORDER_TIME", C.CAFE_NAME CAFE_NAME, SUM((M.PRICE + M.PRICE_ADD * OL.ORDER_STATE )*OL.ORDERLINE_AMOUNT) PRICE FROM ORDERS O JOIN ORDERLINE OL ON (O.ORDER_SEQ = OL.ORDER_SEQ) JOIN MENU M ON (OL.MENU_SEQ = M.MENU_SEQ) JOIN CAFE C ON (M.ADMIN_ID = C.ADMIN_ID) WHERE O.EMAIL = #{email} GROUP BY TO_CHAR(O.ORDER_TIME, 'yyyy-MM-dd'), C.CAFE_NAME ORDER BY 1 DESC
